p: All assays were performed in triplicate. The results were expressed as mean ± standard deviation (SD). One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) followed by Tukey’s post hoc test with α = 0.05 were conducted under Xlstat software environment version 2018. Afterwards, principal component and hierarchical clustering analyses were carried out with R software v.3.6.1 by using the package FactoMineR.
